ctu_text:
The primary objective of this scheme is to help in the rehabilitation of widows after remarriage.
Widow Re-Marriage Scheme launched by the Ministry of Women and Child Development, Government of Himachal Pradesh. The main purpose of the scheme is to help in the rehabilitation of widows, by encouraging men to enter into wedlock with widows. This scheme provides financial assistance to such widows.

ctu_text:
The initiative has helped many destitute widows of the state. All widow permanent residents of Himachal can apply to the scheme. More details and application form can be obtained at nearest District welfare office, the Government of Himachal Pradesh.
